books.title: The Silent Patient
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking.
books.author: Alex Michaelides

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.description: A novel about a young girl who grows up isolated in the marshes of North Carolina.
books.author: Delia Owens

books.title: The Goldfinch
books.description: A coming-of-age novel about a boy who survives an explosion at an art museum.
books.author: Donna Tartt

books.title: Educated
books.description: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho.
books.author: Tara Westover

books.title: The Night Circus
books.description: A fantasy novel about a magical competition between two young illusionists.
books.author: Erin Morgenstern

books.title: Little Fires Everywhere
books.description: A drama about two families in a suburban community and the secrets that come to light.
books.author: Celeste Ng
